summary: Ray's half Pakistani and half white. When his parents' marriage dissolves, Ray's perspective of Ms. Right falls deeply into question.
cast: Zachary Levi|Fran Kranz|Sarah Shahi|Bonnie Somerville|Brian George|Kathy Baker|Gerry Bednob|Phil Rosenthal|Jasen Wade|Rex Lee|Cody Klop|Jake Kasdan|Art Evans|David Doty|Sharmila Devar|Caitlin Crosby|Wendy Braun|Nazanin Boniadi|Keith Blaney|Lance Barber|Aris Alvarado|Buckley Norris|Lucy Davis|Lucas Kinan|Cristine Rose|Yamil Vazquez|Damon Viola
title: Shades of Ray
